moves.3... Nf6: I usually play Bc5 but I decided to change things up.
moves.4. O-O Bc5 5. Nc3 O-O 6. d3 d6 7. h3 a6: I had sensed a boring middle game coming up so I decided to go and attack.
moves.9... Nd4: This is one of the only moves.
moves.10. Nxf6+ Qxf6 11. Nxd4 Bxd4 12. Bd5 c6: Driving the bishop away and preparing d5.
moves.19... Rab8 20. Kh1: !? What was he doing? (Bf4! was winning.)
moves.20... Bc7 21. Bb4 Rfe8 22. Rfe1 b5: Getting pawn-b7 out of the way.
moves.25... Bxd3: Why pass up a tasty pawn?
moves.27. Bxf7+: Re1 retained a slight hope that I might overlook a back-rank mate.
moves.27... Qxf7: He saw there was no way out and resigned. What a game!
